name: Steve HUTZ, Appellant, v. STEFANAK & SON and Workmen's Compensation Appeal Board

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
PAPADAKOS, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: Steve HUTZ, Appellant, v. STEFANAK & SON and Workmen’s Compensation Appeal Board.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
PAPADAKOS, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Richard G. Spagnolli, Caroselli, Spagnolli & Beachler, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
J. Lawson Johnston, Dickie, McCamey & Chilcote and George M. Schumann, Pittsburgh, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
580 A.2d 757
Steve HUTZ, Appellant, v. STEFANAK & SON and Workmen’s Compensation Appeal Board.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 24, 1990.
Decided Oct. 16, 1990.
Richard G. Spagnolli, Caroselli, Spagnolli & Beachler, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
J. Lawson Johnston, Dickie, McCamey & Chilcote and George M. Schumann, Pittsburgh, for appellees.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
